localResource.name: Cluster
localResource.label: Cluster
localResource.queryString: select o.clusterId as clusterId, o.clusterNameIc as clusterNameIc, o.deleteDate as deleteDate, o.sort as sort from oVirtReportsInputControlCluster as o where (cast(o.datacenterId as string) = $P{P_DataCenter_ID} AND o.clusterId in (SELECT DISTINCT clusterId FROM V23VmConfigurationView) AND o.historyId in (SELECT max(a.historyId) FROM V23ClusterConfigurationView a WHERE a.clusterId = o.clusterId)) or cast(o.clusterId as string) = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' order by o.sort DESC, o.deleteDate DESC
